citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The attending veterinarian has directed yearly site visits. The facility has not had a site visit in the past year. A site visit
needs to be completed by the attending veterinarian. . Each exhibitor shall employ an attending veterinarian under
formal arrangements. In the case of a part-time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal
arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the
exhibitor.
Correct by: 09-20-21
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the President.
End Section

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The attending veterinarian has directed yearly site visits.  The facility has not had a site visit in the past year.  A site visit 
needs to be completed by the attending veterinarian.  .   Each exhibitor shall employ an attending veterinarian under 
formal arrangements. In the case of a part-time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal 
arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the 
exhibitor. 
 
Correct by:  09-20-21 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the President. 
 
End Section
